text: The arrondissement of Condom is an arrondissement of France. It is part of the Gers département in the Occitanie region. Its capital is the city of Condom. ==History== When the arrondissements were created on 17 February 1800, Condom was one of them in the Gers department. ==Geography== It is the northernmost and the largest of the arrondissements of the department, with an area of . It has a population of 65,562 and a population density of inhabitants/km². The arrondissement is bordered to the north by the Lot-et-Garonne (Nouvelle- Aquitaine) department, to the west by the Tarn-et-Garonne (Occitanie) department, to the southwest by the Haute-Garonne (Occitanie) department, to the south by the arrondissement of Auch, and to the west by the Landes (Nouvelle-Aquitaine) department. ==Composition== ===Cantons=== After the reorganisation of the cantons in France, cantons are not subdivisions of the arrondissements so they could have communes that belong to different arrondissements. In the arrondissement of Condom, there are three cantons where not all their "communes" are in the arrondissement: Fezensac, Gascogne- Auscitaine and Gimone-Arrats.
